error.signature: tonic::transport::Error: transport error: error trying to connect: tcp connect error

verdict.summary: Tonic gRPC client cannot connect to the server. Check the endpoint URL, TLS configuration, and server availability.

dead_ends.action: Disable TLS entirely for production to avoid certificate issues
dead_ends.why_fails: Exposes gRPC traffic to interception; violates security requirements

workarounds.action: Verify endpoint URL includes the correct scheme (http:// or https://)
Configure TLS with proper certificates for secure connections

leads_to.condition: When gRPC connection succeeds initially but resets during streaming

preceded_by.condition: When tower service configuration affects tonic transport

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Hyper connection reset is HTTP-level; tonic transport error is gRPC-specific including protocol negotiation
